original_text: Moses thought that his own people would understand him. They would know that God was using him to save them. They would no longer be slaves to work for the Egyptians. But his people did not understand all this.
korean_text: 그는 그의 형제들이 하나님께서 자기의 손을 통하여 구원해 주시는 것을 깨달으리라고 생각하였으나 그들이 깨닫지 못하였더라

sentences.original_text: Moses thought that his own people would understand him.
sentences.korean_translation: 모세는 자기 백성이 자기를 이해할 것이라고 생각했습니다.

sentences.original_text: They would know that God was using him
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 하나님이 그를 사용하고 계시다는 것을 알 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: They would no longer be slaves
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 더 이상 노예가 되지 않을 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: But his people did not understand all this.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그의 백성은 이 모든 것을 이해하지 못했습니다.
